Text:

Also tried Uloader and usbloadergx , doesnt work on them either.

Anyone knows how to make it work ?
Hey sushiface2010, use IOS222. Works fine on my 4.2u using Configurable USB Loader.
BTW, thanks for the upload, SOSteam.
Got it managed to work , thanks for the help Sumo and thanks for the realease SOSteam :P

Hey sushiface2010 i have the same problem that u have. what do u do to make it work.. >Wow>

i can't make this game work. what do i need? what software must be installed?

i have ios222 and have tried both neogamma and usb loader gx. both gives me a black screen and the wii is hung.
i loaded the game with Uloader from disc on IOS 222  .that worked for me
Configurable USB loader under 233 works
Now i get to work to.. i update my usbloader and use iso 223.
i FINALLY got it to work.. i updated IOS 222/223 with the newest hermes cIOS installer (v5) even though it is said that v4 is the best. works as it should in Uloader with IOS 223
someone can help me how to play it from the dvd please??
How about WiiKey? Has anyone got it to work with Wiikey?
Well, I can answer my own question. Works perfectly with Wiikey. Lots of thanks to SOSteam for this. Now I just got to figure out how to unlock all Rush songs :)

BTW... USBLoaderGX wont work.. it doesnt support the newest version of IOS222/223.
Some games might work, but this one doesnt

List of songs in Guitar Hero: Warriors of Rock
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_songs_in_Guitar_Hero:_Warriors_of_Rock
how can i change it to ios222

yea, i can confirm that using an alternate CIOS works. i used ios 223 of hermes v5 which i installed with base 57 or base 37. So use hermes v5 and install to ios 222 or 223 or 224 as either base 57 or 37 and the game should load.
This i have tested using Configurable USB Loader Release 60. U just press 1 on the game and change the cios from 249 to 223 mload (or wherever u installed hermes using base 37 or 57 to)
i have tried Cios 222-mload and Cios 223-mload in Configurable Usb Loader they don't work it just appears as a black screen my wiimote stays on but nothing happens so can someone please help me

u need to update cios 222 and 223..
Download hermes ios installer v5.
verified working with usb loader gx - using cIOS 222
thanks for the upload worked great thanks! Using 4.2E usb loader.
Thanks so much for the upload and the very helpful comments.  Kinda new to all of this, but  managed to figure out how to get this one to work and am very excited to play!!!!
If you configure USB Loader to start it with IOS222 it work. Black screen with default 250 IOS.
